Accessible Clipboard Helper

- Single-file HTML web app with inline CSS and JavaScript.
- Provides a central text input area where users can type or paste text.
- Includes buttons to perform common clipboard-related accessibility actions:
  - Copy text to clipboard.
  - Cut text to clipboard.
  - Paste from clipboard (if browser supports).
  - Clear text input.
- Keyboard accessible: all controls reachable and operable via Tab/Enter/Space.
- ARIA-compliant roles and labels for all interactive elements to support screen readers.
- Live region to announce clipboard action results for screen readers.
- Offline-first: all functionality works entirely in the browser with no external dependencies.
- Saves the current text content automatically to localStorage on change.
- Loads saved text from localStorage on page load.
- Export/import feature via JSON for the text content:
  - Export button downloads current text as a JSON file.
  - Import button allows loading text from a valid JSON file and replaces current text.
- Responsive layout suitable for desktop and mobile screen widths.
- Visual focus indicators for all interactive elements for keyboard users.
- Minimal, clean UI with high contrast for readability and accessibility compliance.
